name: Irresistible Charm
text: Defeat the Enchantress scenario as any hero(es). After setup, place 5 charm counters on the [[Enchantment]] card in each playerâ€™s play area.

name: Strength in Diversity
text: Defeat any scenario as any hero(es). For this scenario, each player must adhere to the following deckbuilding restriction: no two allies in your deck can have any of the same printed traits, including identity-specific allies.

name: The Futurist
text: Defeat the Iron Man leader as any hero(es). During this scenario, whenever a Tech attachment is revealed, deal 2 indirect damage to each player, and whenever the Stark Tower side scheme is defeated, deal it to the first player as a facedown encounter card.
